flawed_nl_solution:
On the math test he gets 30 questions correct because 40 x 0.75 = <<40*0.75=30>>30
On the English test he gets 49 questions right because 50 x 0.98 = <<50*0.98=49>>49
He gets 97 questions right in total.
#### 97

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 79, not 97. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
